hints.content:
First, let's fill in $\purpleD{900}+\blueE{20}$ on the place value chart.

$\begin{align}
\purpleD{900} &= \purpleD{9}\text{ hundreds}\\\\
\blueE{20} &= \blueE{2}\text{ tens}\\\\
\maroonD0 &= \maroonD0\text{ ones}
\end{align}$


Hundreds | Tens | Ones
:-: | :-: | :-: | :-:
$\purpleD{9}$ | $\blueE2$ | $\maroonD0$

Now, let's say the number $\purpleD9\blueE2\maroonD0$ out loud and write it in written form.

$\purpleD{\text{nine hundred}}\blueE{\text{ twenty}}$

Here is the completed chart:

Number Form | Word Form | Expanded Form
- | - | -
$920$ | Nine hundred twenty | ${900}+{20}$

question.content:
**Complete the chart.**

Number Form | Word Form | Expanded Form
- | - | -
[[☃ dropdown 1]] | [[☃ dropdown 2]] | $900 + 20$
